name: hedged
content:

past simple and past participle of
hedge
[ T + adv/prep, usually passive ] to limit something severely: We've got permission, but it's hedged about/around with strict conditions.
[ I ] to try to avoid giving an answer or taking any action: Stop hedging and tell me what you really think.
